name: Sortie de bain
summary: Just before supper, Daddy asks his young daughter to take her bath, which is not as easy as pie.
info:
• 中文名: 浴衣
  • 别名: 出浴
  • 上映年度: 1995
  • 片长: 4min
  • 制片国家/地区: 比利时
  • 语言: 法语
  • 导演: Florence Henrard
  • 编剧: Florence Henrard
  • 主演: Luna Incolle / Vincent Jamoulle / Cecilia Marum
